department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: Software development and consulting services for Enterprise and Cloud Platforms for Canada-wide contracts. Business License Management Software solutions that incorporates all available Razorpay, and other platfroms. This is a RFI a existing technical, operational, or financial achivements in national Canada wide project
description: This procurement is for license management software that enables real-time tracking and management of subscribed licenses for enterprise systems. The purpose of this procurement is to acquire a comprehensive license management software solution that caters to the needs of large-scale enterprise systems. The solution is expected to provide robust security features, scalable architecture, and seamless integration with existing enterprise systems. Business License Management Software
full_summary:
====================================

### Contract Notice
=======================

**Title:** Spectrum Management Licensed Software Solutions

**Contract Reference Number:** WS4337862394-Doc4337943463

**Tender Status:** Expired

We received a government tender announcement for Spectrum Management Licensed Software Solutions. The tender, reference number WS4337862394-Doc4337943463, has expired.

### Procurement Details
-----------------------

- **Publication Date:** December 5, 2023
- **Tender Closing Date:** February 7, 2024 (14:00:00)
- **Expected Contract Start Date:** Not specified
- **Expected Contract End Date:** Not specified

### Procurement Method
---------------------

The procurement method for this contract is **Competitive - Open Bidding**.

### Procurement Category
-----------------------

The procurement category for this contract is **SRV** (Services).

### Goods and Services
---------------------

The goods and services required for this contract include:

- **License management software**
- **Enterprise system management software**

### Trade Agreements
------------------

This contract is subject to the following trade agreements:

- Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
- World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
- Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
- Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
- Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
- Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
- Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
- Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
- Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
- Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
- Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
- Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)

### Regions of Delivery
-------------------------

The regions of delivery for this contract include:

- **National Capital Region (NCR)**

### Contracting Entity
------------------------

The contracting entity for this contract is:

- **Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)**
- Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5
- Country: Canada
